parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Nil value. This value can be used to undefine existing [[Variables|variables]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[nil]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>variableToDestroy = [[nil]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _variable = 50;
_variable = [[nil]];
[[hint]] [[format]] ["Variable = %1", _variable]; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// will display "Variable <template><title>=</title></template> any" (<template><title>arma3</title></template>)</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isNil]], [[Variables]]
</value></part></template>
